name: Death Rooms (SMV Software)
description:
Escape from rooms full of deadly traps. 

Very fast and difficult. 

Not for cowards!

  • Choose from three levels of difficulty.
  • You can play with the arrows, WASD, or using a joystick
  • Escape key to pause.

I appreciate any comments or suggestions.

This is my first participation in a Game Jam ... Please be nice.  :)

New in v1.1.0:

  • Two new death rooms
  • Room selection in the menu
  • New sound effects
  • Victory screen
  • Blood effect on death
